description:
this is for review and validate sections.
Rate Error [ Duration ] is used here

targets.expr:
sum(increase(varnish_main_sc_rx_overflow{org=~"$org",tier=~"$tier",host=~"$cache_node"}[$__rate_interval])) +
sum(increase(varnish_main_sc_pipe_overflow{org=~"$org",tier=~"$tier",host=~"$cache_node"}[$__rate_interval]))

# SC overflow separated from other type of overflow

sum(increase(varnish_main_losthdr{org=~"$org",tier=~"$tier",host=~"$cache_node"}[$__rate_interval]))
# Header overflow separated from other type of overflow

panels.description:
MAIN backend metric

Backend Wait and Fail

Backend Fetch Fail

Current Network Usage

MAIN metric request and response bytes

targets.expr:
sum(irate(varnish_main_s_req_hdrbytes{org=~"$org",tier=~"$tier",host=~"$cache_node"}[$__rate_interval]))

# irate is used to get raw numbers on "surges" of bytes
# used in transforming to "ingress total"

sum(rate(varnish_main_s_req_hdrbytes{org=~"$org",tier=~"$tier",host=~"$cache_node"}[$__rate_interval])) + 
sum(rate(varnish_main_s_req_bodybytes{org=~"$org",tier=~"$tier",host=~"$cache_node"}[$__rate_interval]))

# ingress bytes expected to be very minimal than egress (response) bytes

(sum(rate(varnish_main_s_resp_hdrbytes{org=~"$org",tier=~"$tier",host=~"$cache_node"}[$__rate_interval])) by (host) + 
 sum(rate(varnish_main_s_resp_bodybytes{org=~"$org",tier=~"$tier",host=~"$cache_node"}[$__rate_interval])) by (host)) * 8

# inverted graphs per host respose bytes

(sum(rate(varnish_main_s_resp_hdrbytes{org=~"$org",tier=~"$tier",host=~"$cache_node"}[$__rate_interval])) + 
 sum(rate(varnish_main_s_resp_bodybytes{org=~"$org",tier=~"$tier",host=~"$cache_node"}[$__rate_interval]))) * 8

# hidden in view, used as positive numbers in legend. Total of response bytes in Y axis (not inverted)

panels.title: Traffic byte

panels.description: Derived rate of request seen per session
panels.title: Request

panels.description:
Higher is better, meaning connection is reused

Exclude cluster,default,goto
panels.title: Backend

panels.description: Cache hit, hit_grace, hitmiss, hitpass VS synth, pass

targets.expr:
sum(rate(varnish_main_s_synth{org=~"$org",tier=~"$tier",host=~"$cache_node"}[$__rate_interval])) /
sum(rate(varnish_main_client_req{org=~"$org",tier=~"$tier",host=~"$cache_node"}[$__rate_interval]))

# Synth usage may be higher depends on VCL. This must not be included when trying to account for 100% of client requests

sum(rate(varnish_main_sc_rx_timeout{org=~"$org",tier=~"$tier",host=~"$cache_node"}[$__rate_interval]))

# may be seen as normal behavior for some application

list.description: interval used for queries and result grouping
list.label: Query Rate Interval
list.name: _interval
